PSCT.Base: When a card or effect is activated that would inflict damage to you (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; make that effect damage to you 0. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-Eyes" card you control; this turn, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
